headline: Littelfuse (LFUS) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: Gregory N. Henderson: Thank you, David, and thank you to everyone for joining us today.  An important milestone in this process was the hiring of our new CFO, Abhi Khandelwal, for the quarter.  Abhi joins us from IDEX Corporation, and he brings more than 2 decades of financial and operational leadership.
